name: destcable/weather-php
description: Weather PHP Weather Library: Your trusted companion for accessing accurate weather data. Easily integrate this powerful library into your PHP projects and get up-to-date weather information anywhere in the world. Whether you need current weather conditions, a forecast for the coming days, or detailed climate data, Weather PHP has everything you need in a convenient format. The library provides easy-to-use methods for extracting data, making the process of integrating and working with weather information as easy as possible. Don't limit yourself - from mobile apps to web services, Weather PHP is ready to provide you with all the weather information you need.
